page.title: 06HOWIES GRAIN MERCHANT DUNLOP
page.content: R.HOWIES AND SONS SET UP BUSINESS IN DUNLOP AS JOINERS AND CARTWRIGHTS IN 1850.NEARLY ALL THE TIMBER USED THEN WAS GROWN LOCALLY. OVER THE YEARS THE FIRM HAS UNDERGONE MANY CHANGES BUT THE BUSINESS HAS ALWAYS BEEN RELATED TO AGRICULTURE. HOWIES HAVE BECOME MORE SAFETY CONSCIOUS OVER THE YEARS. NOWADAYS EMPLOYEES IN THE INDUSTRY WEAR MASKS, PROTECTIVE CLOTHING AND TIN HATS TO AVOID INJURY COMPUTERS HAVE BEEN INTRODUCED FOR STAFFING INFORMATION AND STOCK CONTROL AND THE FIRM BANK LOCALLY. HOWIES IS STILL A FAMILY FIRM AND BECAUSE MOST OF THE FAMILY LIVE LOCALLY THEY TAKE A LIVELY INTEREST IN COMMUNITY AFFAIRS.
